      • Game

        public Game(Board board,
            java.util.List<Player> players,
            int killsToFinish)
        Parameters:
        board - Board selected for the game
        players - List of players
        killsToFinish - Number of kills before triggering final frenzy
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if board or players are null, player size is < 3 or killsNum is negative

      • startNextTurn

        public void startNextTurn()
        Start next turn, incrementing turn number, changing active player and setting number of actions. If it's game over, distribute kill points to players and finish the game.

      • isGameOver

        public boolean isGameOver()
        Calculate if game is finished (all players have done their final frenzy rounds).
        Returns:
        true if final frenzy is over, false if not

      • getPlayerFromColor

        Returns:

      • handleDamageInteraction

        public void handleDamageInteraction(PlayerColor shooter,
                                    PlayerColor target,
                                    Damage damage)
        Handle game logic about damage action, updating damage taken by target and registering a kill if player is dead.
        Parameters:
        shooter - Player color of the shooter
        target - Player color of the target
        damage - Damage done to target
